text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea singkawang (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti or Meranti Merah) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. 1998.  Shorea singkawang.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
